verses.verse: And an angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> came up<WH5927> from<WH4480> Gilgal<WH1537> to<WH413> Bochim,<WH1066> and said,<WH559> I made you to go up<WH5927> <WH853> out of Egypt,<WH4480> <WH4714> and have brought<WH935> you unto<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> unto your fathers;<WH1> and I said,<WH559> I will never<WH3808> <WH5769> break<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> with<WH854> you.

And ye<WH859> shall make<WH3772> no<WH3808> league<WH1285> with the inhabitants<WH3427> of this<WH2063> land;<WH776> ye shall throw down<WH5422> their altars:<WH4196> but ye have not<WH3808> obeyed<WH8085> my voice:<WH6963> why<WH4100> have ye done<WH6213> this?<WH2063>

Wherefore I also<WH1571> said,<WH559> I will not<WH3808> drive them out<WH1644> <WH853> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you; but they shall be<WH1961> as thorns in your sides,<WH6654> and their gods<WH430> shall be<WH1961> a snare<WH4170> unto you.

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> <WH853> these<WH428> words<WH1697> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that the people<WH5971> lifted up<WH5375> <WH853> their voice,<WH6963> and wept.<WH1058>
And they called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of that<WH1931> place<WH4725> Bochim:<WH1066> and they sacrificed<WH2076> there<WH8033> unto the LORD.<WH3068>

And when Joshua<WH3091> had let<WH853> the people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went<WH1980> every man<WH376> unto his inheritance<WH5159> to possess<WH3423> <WH853> the land.<WH776>

And the people<WH5971> served<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of Joshua,<WH3091> and all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of the elders<WH2205> that<WH834> outlived<WH748> <WH3117> <WH310> Joshua,<WH3091> who<WH834> had seen<WH7200> <WH853> all<WH3605> the great<WH1419> works<WH4639> of the LORD,<WH3068> that<WH834> he did<WH6213> for Israel.<WH3478>
And Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD,<WH3068> died,<WH4191> being a hundred<WH3967> and ten<WH6235> years<WH8141> old.<WH1121>

And they buried<WH6912> him in the border<WH1366> of his inheritance<WH5159> in Timnath-heres,<WH8556> in the mount<WH2022> of Ephraim,<WH669> on the north side<WH4480> <WH6828> of the hill<WH2022> Gaash.<WH1608>

And also<WH1571> all<WH3605> that<WH1931> generation<WH1755> were gathered<WH622> unto<WH413> their fathers:<WH1> and there arose<WH6965> another<WH312> generation<WH1755> after<WH310> them, which<WH834> knew<WH3045> not<WH3808> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> nor yet<WH1571> <WH853> the works<WH4639> which<WH834> he had done<WH6213> for Israel.<WH3478>
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> <WH853> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD,<WH3068> and served<WH5647> <WH853> Baalim: <WH1168>

And they forsook<WH5800> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of their fathers,<WH1> which brought them out<WH3318> <WH853> of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and followed<WH1980> <WH310> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> of the gods<WH4480> <WH430> of the people<WH5971> that<WH834> were round about<WH5439> them, and bowed themselves<WH7812> unto them, and provoked<WH3707> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> to anger.<WH3707>
And they forsook<WH5800> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> and served<WH5647> Baal<WH1168> and Ashtaroth.<WH6252>

And the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> was hot<WH2734> against Israel,<WH3478> and he delivered<WH5414> them into the hands<WH3027> of spoilers<WH8154> that spoiled<WH8155> them, and he sold<WH4376> them into the hands<WH3027> of their enemies<WH341> round about,<WH4480> <WH5439> so that they could<WH3201> not<WH3808> any longer<WH5750> stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> their enemies.<WH341>

Whithersoever <WH3605> <WH834> they went out,<WH3318> the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was<WH1961> against them for evil,<WH7451> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had said,<WH1696> and as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had sworn<WH7650> unto them: and they were greatly<WH3966> distressed.<WH3334>
Nevertheless the LORD<WH3068> raised up<WH6965> judges,<WH8199> which delivered<WH3467> them out of the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of those that spoiled<WH8154> them.

And yet<WH1571> they would not<WH3808> hearken<WH8085> unto<WH413> their judges,<WH8199> but<WH3588> they went a whoring<WH2181> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and bowed themselves<WH7812> unto them: they turned<WH5493> quickly<WH4118> out of<WH4480> the way<WH1870> which<WH834> their fathers<WH1> walked<WH1980> in, obeying<WH8085> the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD;<WH3068> but they did<WH6213> not<WH3808> so.<WH3651>

And when<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> raised them up<WH6965> judges,<WH8199> then the LORD<WH3068> was<WH1961> with<WH5973> the judge,<WH8199> and delivered<WH3467> them out of the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of their enemies<WH341> all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of the judge:<WH8199> for<WH3588> it repented<WH5162> the LORD<WH3068> because of their groanings<WH4480> <WH5009> by reason of them<WH4480> <WH6440> that oppressed<WH3905> them and vexed<WH1766> them.

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when the judge<WH8199> was dead,<WH4191> that they returned,<WH7725> and corrupted<WH7843> themselves more than their fathers,<WH4480> <WH1> in following<WH1980> <WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them, and to bow down<WH7812> unto them; they ceased<WH5307> not<WH3808> from their own doings,<WH4480> <WH4611> nor from their stubborn way.<WH4480> <WH1870> <WH7186>

And the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> was hot<WH2734> against Israel;<WH3478> and he said,<WH559> Because<WH3282> that<WH834> this<WH2088> people<WH1471> hath transgressed<WH5674> <WH853> my covenant<WH1285> which<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> <WH853> their fathers,<WH1> and have not<WH3808> hearkened<WH8085> unto my voice;<WH6963>

I <WH589> also<WH1571> will not<WH3808> henceforth<WH3254> drive out<WH3423> any<WH376> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> them of<WH4480> the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> Joshua<WH3091> left<WH5800> when he died: <WH4191>

That <WH4616> through them I may prove<WH5254> <WH853> Israel,<WH3478> whether they<WH1992> will keep<WH8104> <WH853> the way<WH1870> of the LORD<WH3068> to walk<WH1980> therein, as<WH834> their fathers<WH1> did keep<WH8104> it, or<WH518> not.<WH3808>

Therefore the LORD<WH3068> left<WH5117> <WH853> those<WH428> nations,<WH1471> without<WH1115> driving them out<WH3423> hastily;<WH4118> neither<WH3808> delivered<WH5414> he them into the hand<WH3027> of Joshua.<WH3091>
